title: Behind the scenes of the NBC News poll with Chuck and Mark
description: Mark Murray, senior editor for the NBC News Political Unit, joins Chuck to discuss the process of creating the NBC News poll and the insights we learned from the latest numbers.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Mark Murray, senior editor for the NBC News Political Unit, joins Chuck to discuss the process of creating the NBC News poll and the insights we learned from the latest numbers.
itunes:title: Behind the scenes of the NBC News poll with Chuck and Mark
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Go behind the scenes of the NBC News poll with Chuck and Mark as they discuss the process of crafting the questions, and then return with the final numbers.
itunes:subtitle: Go behind the scenes of the NBC News poll with Chuck and Mark as they discuss the process of crafting the questions, and then return with the final numbers.
